title: Settings of the acoustic system
description:
Settings file for the acoustic system describing the sample space, beam and topology.
Schema on github: https://github.com/Engineer2B/PowerCalculator-Schemas

LatticeSpacing.description: Spacing between points inside the lattice box in [m, m, m].

LatticeExtrema.description: Minimal and maximal values that describe the lattice box in [m].

X.description: Minimal and maximal X values of the box in [m].

Y.description: Minimal and maximal Y values of the box in [m].

Z.description: Minimal and maximal Z values of the box in [m].

RaysPerElement.description: Number of rays per transducer element.

PowerLimit.description: If the power of the ray goes below this limit in [W], no new rays can be generated from the ray.

ThetaMax.description: Maximal angle up to which rays are generated by the transducer elements. Theta is defined for each individual transducer element as the angle between the direction of the element and the plane in which it lies.

Focus.description: Position towards which the focus is phase-shifted in [m, m, m].

Power.description: Total amount of power that the transducer sends out in [W].

Frequency.description: Frequency at which the transducer elements oscillate in [Hz].

FocusDiameter.description: Diameter of the area of focus in [m].

Inclination.description: X or Y axis rotation angle in radians.

Azimuth.description: Z axis rotation angle in radians.

Translation.description: Vector of translation in [m, m, m] (if ScaleFactor is 1).
